verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, that <S%H5576>Sennacherib<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against all the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and took <S%H8610>them<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> from <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> with a <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H2426>army<s%>. And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H8585>conduit<s%> of the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H1295>pool<s%> in the <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3526>fuller<s%>'s <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Then came <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto him <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, who was over the <S%H1004>household<s%>, and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H3098>Joah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, the <S%H2142>recorder<s%>.

And <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Say ye now to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, What <S%H986>confidence<s%> is this wherein thou <S%H982>trustest<s%>?

I <S%H559>say<s%>, thy <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H1369>strength<s%> for the <S%H4421>war<s%> are but <S%H8193>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>: now on whom dost thou <S%H982>trust<s%>, that thou hast rebelled against <S%H4775>me<s%>?

Behold <S%H982><s%>, thou trustest upon the <S%H4938>staff<s%> of this <S%H7533>bruised<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>, even upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, whereon if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5564>lean<s%>, it will <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and <S%H5344>pierce<s%> <S%H6547>it<s%>: so is Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to all that trust on <S%H982>him<s%>.

But if thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H982>me<s%>, We trust in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>: is not that <S%H1116>he<s%>, whose high places and whose <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> hath taken <S%H5493>away<s%>, and hath <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, Ye shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H4196>altar<s%>?

Now <S%H6148>therefore<s%>, I pray thee, give pledges to my <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, if thou be <S%H3201>able<s%> on thy part to <S%H5414>set<s%> riders upon <S%H7392>them<s%>.

How then canst thou turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6346>captain<s%> of the <S%H6996>least<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and put thy <S%H982>trust<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and for <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>?

And am I now come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1107>without<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> against this <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>? Jehovah <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>me<s%>, Go up against this <S%H776>land<s%>, and destroy <S%H7843>it<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> and <S%H3098>Joah<s%> unto <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%>, <S%H1696>Speak<s%>, I pray <S%H5650>thee<s%>, unto thy servants in the Syrian <S%H762>language<s%>; for we <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H1696>it<s%>: and speak not to us in the <S%H3066>Jews<s%>' language, in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are on the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

But <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Hath my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to thy <S%H113>master<s%>, and to <S%H1696>thee<s%>, to speak these <S%H1697>words<s%>? hath he not sent me to the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, to <S%H398>eat<s%> their own <S%H2716>dung<s%>, and to <S%H8354>drink<s%> their own water with <S%H7272>you<s%>?

Then <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>, and <S%H7121>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H3066>Jews<s%>' language, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Let not <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5377>deceive<s%> <S%H3201>you<s%>; for he will not be able to deliver <S%H5337>you<s%>:

neither let <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> make you <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5337>surely<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5892>us<s%>; this city shall not be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> not to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>: for thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, <S%H6213>Make<s%> your <S%H1293>peace<s%> with <S%H3318>me<s%>, and come out to <S%H398>me<s%>; and eat ye every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H8384>fig-tree<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> ye every <S%H376>one<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of his own <S%H953>cistern<s%>;

until I <S%H935>come<s%> and take you <S%H3947>away<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> like your own <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>grain<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>.

Beware lest <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5496>persuade<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H376>us<s%>. Hath any of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>?

Where are the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> and <S%H774>Arpad<s%>? where are the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H5617>Sepharvaim<s%>? and have they <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>?

Who are they among all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of these <S%H776>countries<s%>, that have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> their <S%H776>country<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>?

But they held their <S%H2790>peace<s%>, and <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not a <S%H1697>word<s%>; for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H559>was<s%>, saying, Answer him <S%H6030>not<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, that was over the <S%H1004>household<s%>, and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H3098>Joah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, the <S%H2142>recorder<s%>, to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> with their <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%>.
